title: What are the best innovative business ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most innovative startups introduce a new technology or a new business model to the world. Or both. According to the framework below we can make a distinction between four main types of innovations - routine (also known as incremental), disruptive, architectural and radical. My answer will focus on startups whose products or services fit within the last three categories. The list is by no means extensive or set in any order.  StoreDot is developing a fast-charging (5 minutes or less) batteries for both mobile devices and electric cars. MindMaze pioneers a computing platform that brings together mixed reality, artificial intelligence, brain imaging, and neuroscience. At this point, used in hospitals for stroke victim therapy. Energy-Floors provides flooring systems that are able to collect kinetic energy from dance floors, school playgrounds, etc. RanMarine Technology specializes in autonomous aquadrones, which remove waste from the oceans. 23andMe offers affordable DNA analysis. Nerdalize distributes cloud servers over houses. Homeowners can use the residual heat for hot showers and to warm their house. Hyperloop One is trying to significantly cut down transportation times. WeatherHYDE designs sustainable, scalable and financially-creative shelters for the homeless. (non-profit organization). Be My Eyes brings sight to the blind and visually impaired through a network of sighted volunteers.
